name: Moons of Ventocia
description:
Moons of Ventocia is a vast open world 3D Platformer / Action RPG.

Explore Ventocia's 64 km^2 overworld, plus the five strange Moons of Ventocia on a magickal journey to stop the growing threat of Eclipse, an otherworldly horror of religious proportions!

Create and control your party of up to four little Ventocian Gnomelings from four unique and exciting character classes.

Solve fun and interesting platformer puzzles to awaken the Goddess Ventocia before Eclipse destroys the planet!

Coming soon!
